entry.title: Rip My Ribcage Open (And Devour What Is Truly Yours)
entry.summary:
Author: Welsh_Woman

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,914Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 35

Summary: After so many years of fighting all the strange shit that Beacon Hills throws at them, the McCall Pack are a little leery when they are visited by a Pack that claims they're there to help them become more of a team, more of a family... When the Hale Pack arrive and speak of a long standing claim to the Beacon Hills territory, Scott is instantly suspicious and combative, but Stiles wants to know who these newcomers are and what they can share. And why he feels so drawn to their Alpha, to a man that seems to be just as entranced by Stiles, despite the fact that he holds a secret that might topple the fraught bonds the McCall Pack share.

entry.title: Poolside Secrets
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,328Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: Eli Hale has always wondered why, every couple of weeks, his father Derek sends him and his mother Jennifer off on an all-expenses-paid shopping spree with the unlimited black Mastercard—insisting they leave the estate for the entire afternoon while the mysterious “pool boy” comes to do maintenance. This time, Eli fakes a stomach ache and stays behind, hiding in the bushes by the pool to finally uncover the truth. What he finds shocks him to his core: his macho, straight-presenting father—naked, plugged, and shamelessly sunbathing with his massive, fat, hairy ass on full display—getting thoroughly worshipped, eaten, and wrecked by the pool boy’s eleven-inch monster cock. From the jeweled plug being slowly pulled out to Derek begging to be bred like a desperate slut, Eli watches (and secretly records) every filthy, explicit moment, his world tilting on its axis as he realizes this definitely isn’t the first time. Or the one where Eli discovers that the real reason Derek sends the family away is so he can get his closeted, greedy, hairy hole absolutely destroyed by the hung pool boy, and Eli can’t look away.

entry.summary:

Summary: “Dude!” Scott says. “Did you know Derek Hale is over there?!” Stiles laughs, nodding. “Yeah, Scotty, I noticed.” “You have to go say something! We have to go say something!” “Say what?” Stiles asks. “I see your 2014 hat trick against the Oilers in my dreams?” “That would be a good place to start,” Scott says. “You should tell him about the rookie card!” “So I can seem like a pathetic kid?” Stiles scoffs. “Yeah, great idea.” “I think it’s cute,” Kira tells him. “Very sweet.” “Sweet,” Lydia agrees, “but not sexy.” “Sexy?” Scott says, screwing up his face. “Why would we want to be sexy in front of Derek Hale?” -0- In which Derek is Stiles' hockey hero, and they end up in the same bar together one spring evening in 2017.

Summary: After wrapping up an important case, Stiles earns a few extra days off. On a whim, he decides to return home to Beacon Hills to visit his father for a relaxing break.
